input.sentences: a beautiful pirate ready for halloween
and these are the 3 stooges dressed for halloween
beautiful pirate ladies ready for the party
we are going to have so much fun tonight
tired from all of the activities of halloween
output.sentences: I was getting ready with a pirate costume for Halloween night.
The guys we call the 3 stooges were excited this Halloween, and even dressed up for it.
My girls were ready, and they were pirates too for the party.
Tonight was going to be pure fun!
I was so tired after all of the Halloween activities.
